reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing all major cancer types from GLOBOCAN 2005: includes lung (~12.5%), breast (~10%), colorectal (~9%), liver (~7%), stomach (~6%), prostate (~5%), cervical (~5%), non-Hodgkin lymphoma (~3%), leukemia (~2.5%), pancreas (~2.5%) and other cancers. Total global estimate ~143 per 100k. Low confidence due to extreme heterogeneity of tumor types with vastly different biology and incidence patterns.
